attributes.action: To hold national and local Public inquiries into grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The inquiry should focus on why it has taken so long for any action to take place. Why if didn't come to light sooner and why were people in authority so reluctant to come forward, expose, and do something about it. This is a crime against the children of Britain and it is the governments responsibility to see that justice is done including abolishing political correctness.
attributes.background: For government to hold a public inquiry into the grooming gangs scandal that has rocked the nation. Also for local councils to hold inquiries into the grooming gangs scandal.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
